Texts.Eng: I don't know what's being advertised here, but I already feel compelled to buy it.
Texts.Chs: 我不知道这里的广告是什么，但我已经迫不及待地想买了。

Texts.Eng: Oh wow! ... So what does this say exactly?
Texts.Chs: 哦，哇。。。那么这到底是怎么说的呢？

Texts.Eng: Sssign bubbles are bright like candy.
Texts.Chs: 标记泡泡像糖果一样明亮。

Texts.Eng: The best way to get a consumers' attention is an aesthetically pleasing ad campaign. That's just marketing 101!
Texts.Chs: 吸引消费者注意力的最好方法是一个美观的广告活动。这只是营销101！

Texts.Eng: The colors on this sign certainly pop!
Texts.Chs: 这个标志上的颜色一定很流行！

Texts.Eng: These colors are fine and all, but what am I supposed to be gettin' from this sign?
Texts.Chs: 这些颜色都很好，但是我应该从这个标志上得到什么呢？

Texts.Eng: These colors are quite charming. They remind me of grounded tapestries.
Texts.Chs: 这些颜色很迷人。它们让我想起了落地挂毯。

Texts.Eng: You're not quite sure what this says, but it sure does stand out!
Texts.Chs: 你不太确定这句话是怎么说的，但它确实很突出！
